fullText: Director Kenny Leon brings a fresh perspective to Thornton Wilder's 1938 masterpiece, with Jim Parsons delivering a deeply moving performance as the Stage Manager in this thoughtful revival.
dtliExcerpt: Director Kenny Leon brings a fresh perspective to Thornton Wilder's 1938 masterpiece, with Jim Parsons delivering a deeply moving performance as the Stage Manager in this thoughtful revival.
